forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 41F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Periods of light rain early. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining mainly cloudy. High 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
